body.p: J. B. Gray, Esq, an attorney at our bar has, at the request of his friends, become an applicant for the appointment of Justice of the Peace in place of Esqr Shrock resigned -- Mr Gray is well qualified for the position & we would like much to have him appointed; and if you can give him the place I am satisfied that he will so discharge its duties as to leave no cause for complaint in any quarter
